 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזַל‎</span>] **verb** ==flow, trickle, drop, distil== (poetry) ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזַל‎</span> of ***flowing*** water; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***descendit, defluet*** [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2331</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***descend*** (.milk into udder, but also in general)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽזְלוּ‎</span> [[Judg.5.5|Judg 5:5]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִזַּל‎</span> [[Num.24.7|Num 24:7]] etc; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹזְלִים‎</span>[[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***flow*** subject water, [[Num.24.7|Num 24:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); [[Ps.147.18|Ps 147:18]] compare [[Jer.18.14|Jer 18:14]] subject clouds, [[Job.36.28|Job 36:28]] followed by rain as accusative of material [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:117z»§ 117z</sup> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעף‎</span> and, v[[Job.36.27|Job 36:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זקק‎</span>), compare [[Jer.9.17|Jer 9:17]] (of eyelids); so .fig. [[Isa.45.8|Isa 45:8]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶדֶק‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעף‎</span>); of mountains (i.e. their torrents) [[Judg.5.6|Judg 5:6]] according to [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#GFM|GFM]] and others, but see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זלל‎</span> especially participle as substantive, = ***streams, floods***, [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תהום‎</span> of Red Sea); [[Ps.78.44|Ps 78:44]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְאֹר‎</span>); for drinking [[Ps.78.16|Ps 78:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מים כַנהרות‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תהום‎</span> v[[Ps.78.15|Ps 78:15]]), [[Prov.5.15|Prov 5:15]] out of well (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מים‎</span>); for irrigation [[Isa.44.3|Isa 44:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מים‎</span>); figurative of Shulamite <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןלְֿבָנוֺן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Song.4.15|Song 4:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מעין גנים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎באר מים‎</span>) 

**2.** ***distil***, of spices <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשָׂמִים‎</span> [[Song.4.16|Song 4:16]] figurative of words, like dew [[Deut.32.2|Deut 32:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערף‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** ***lyZIhi*** [[Isa.48.21|Isa 48:21]] ***cause to flow***, water from rock (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוב‎</span>). — See also I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זלל‎</span>.
